sentences.en: A lion’s head was among the trophies of his African trip.
sentences.cn: 他非洲之行的战利品之一是个狮头。

sentences.en: Barcelona will be hoping to bring the trophy back to Spain — sorry, Catalonia — for the first time.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那将有望首次把奖杯捧回西班牙——抱歉，是捧回加泰罗尼亚。

sentences.en: He finished third in the Tote Gold Trophy.
sentences.cn: 他在托特黄金大奖赛中获得季军。

sentences.en: He had heard that the trophy had been sold.
sentences.cn: 他听说奖杯已经被卖掉了。

sentences.en: He held the trophy proudly aloft.
He hung the lion's head as a trophy.
sentences.cn: 他把那狮子头挂起来作为狩猎纪念品.

sentences.en: He went on to win the James E. Sullivan Memorial Trophy as the outstanding amateur athlete of 1962.
sentences.cn: 接着，他又作为1962年度杰出业余运动员赢得了“詹姆斯·E.沙利文纪念奖”。

sentences.en: His darts trophy takes pride of place on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 他将掷镖奖杯放在壁炉顶上最显著的地方.

sentences.en: His name was inscribed on the trophy.
The cup is a cherished trophy of the company.
sentences.cn: 那只奖杯是该公司很珍惜的奖品.

sentences.en: The golfer is pictured on many of the front pages, kissing his trophy as he holds it aloft.
sentences.cn: 许多报纸的头版上都刊登了那个高尔夫球手高高举起奖杯亲吻的照片。

sentences.en: The image of their son holding up the championship trophy would be etched on their memories forever.
sentences.cn: 他们永远也不会忘记儿子高举着冠军奖杯的样子.

sentences.en: The team has won back the trophy.
The trophy is very impressive and rather special because it has a beautiful green patina.
sentences.cn: 这个奖杯给人印象非常深刻，相当特别，因为它表面有一层漂亮的绿锈。

sentences.en: What sticks in my throat is that I wasn't able to win the trophy.
sentences.cn: 令我耿耿于怀的是自己没能获奖。

trans.tran_cn: 纪念品，战利品，奖品，奖杯（牌），胜利纪念柱，战利品雕饰
trans.tran_en: something that you keep to prove your success in something, especially in war or hunting
